title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 490.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 490.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to consideration of sea level rise by the

Department, other State agencies, and applicants for relevant permits, approvals, and funding in the context of programs specified in the Community

Risk and Resiliency Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
490.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 22, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 08, eff. 2/22/2017

Amended

New

York State Register September 25, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 39, eff. 9/25/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
